attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why are u not helping to end this strike 11 days wages lost yet we give millions to labour , come on get in the real world,is your pension safe, ours is not ,come on help us ,managers whereing post mans shirts just to blag the public that posties are working

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
